column5: Lew u just proved your tough enough to live up here lol just need a fishing rod in your hand?
Lew u just proved your tough enough to live up here lol just need a fishing rod in your hand  No thank you Sir, I'm definitely a softwater kinda fisherman
Went to market this morning and was greeted by snow in Kitchener at 6 in the morning. Of course the weather meatheads are assuring us that we should not be seeing any snow in the near future.
Just a light dusting up my way Bruce and it's all gone now but if that's all we get this winter I'm good with that LOL
How is St Jacobs these days. Haven't been there since the fire. Did they rebuild? Bigger?

How is St Jacobs these days. Haven't been there since the fire. Did they rebuild? Bigger? There is a plastic dome structure where the old building stood and a much bigger wooden structure on the east side just before the livestock yard.  We are certainly kept busy outside.
Just a light dusting up my way Bruce and it's all gone now but if that's all we get this winter I'm good with that LOL  Opened the door at 4 this morning and was like, YES. Sorry Lew

Brian Lew just didn't want to get cold feet while he went to his backyard to pick his oranges and pineapples : :just kidding Lew  Bruce we had many wonderful times going to St Jacobs when we lived in Barrie,,,,and u talk about good food omg, wonderful way to spend the day

Back lakes around here were already skimming over this time last year, and we were drilling thru 5 inches on December 2.  Bet were gonna be at least 2 weeks behind this year, 4 days of 8-12 degree highs next week means the boat gets an extra lease on life.
Send it back!!!! Winter is for kids and those who still think they are.
Yeah. I prefer my water soft.  ?
Bring on the ice!!!
Bring on the ice!!!  I wouldnt complain about this,would save on travel,yet Im not going to complain about that as well. Where ever the fish are,I will travel. 100km or 5 km.

I have been wishing for it since I bought a sled. All you snow haters can thank me for the late arrival of winter, im sure I caused that.  It cant get cold soon enough. Bring it, im ready, but my boat is also good to go, so either way i'll make the best of what we get.  S.
I hear ya and im willing to compromise. Winter can start as long as it's outta here by Feb 1st
Looks like you all will get a tease this weekend, but they are  calling for a warmer then norm Dec.  Drifter_016, will be wearing shorts during his visit.

For those of is who only have a kayak I can't wait to bring on 'trout season'. Lady simcoe and a few secret spots and calling.  Co-workers say it will be difficult to find ice this winter. I know it's going to be a bit of a wait but I sure hope not. My flasher is itching.

From the Ontario Blizzard Watch FB page today.   Snow storm: Southwestern and Central Ontario might see some pretty heavy snowfall by Monday as per two separate models. Some are only showing 2-6 inches while others are hinting at more than a foot for some regions in Southwestern Ontario.gasp emoticonBlizzard like conditions are also possible late Saturday night and throughout the day on Sunday as the wind gusts could get pretty intense, even possibly reaching borderline severe. Brace yourselves, winter is coming.
Looks like a local fish this weekend Dave. Heck, might even just work and get some extra cash for a few needed winter toys.
Ha ha you all got snow........   Art
Ha ha you all got snow........   Art We know where you live Art...
Come on down it was shorts and t shirts yesterday lol.   Art
Don't you fret none about being left out.  We're gonna have more than enough to share with our friends down south.
Come on down it was shorts and t shirts yesterday lol.   Art  In Canada, we wear shorts all year long Art
:w00t:Nice left hook Lew.
:w00t:Nice left hook Lew.  Neighbors think I'm crazy cause I wear shorts all winter unless I'm gonna be outside for a couple hours.
